LanguageData.DMS_Machine_Hound.label: Hound
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_Hound.description: A four-legged robot dog able to provide forward reconnaissance and urban combat support during operations. It can be equipped with small-caliber firearms or flamethrowers to provide combat capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_Hound.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_TrashBin.label: Trash Bin
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_TrashBin.description: Cylindrical service robots used in midworld cities to provide road cleaning express food delivery services, and to be the first to assist in evacuation and maintain order when emergencies occur.
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_TrashBin.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBird.label: Verling bird
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBird.description: A quad-drone built for reconnaissance. It is quite fragile in combat but moves extremely fast. It can be equipped with a small-caliber gun or grenade to provide combat capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBird.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBirdA.label: Verling bird
LanguageData.DMS_Machine_VerlingBirdA.description: A quad-drone built for reconnaissance. It is quite fragile in combat but moves extremely fast. It can be equipped with a small-caliber gun or grenade to provide combat capabilities.
